name: Slippy
description:
The ground is slippy. Everything is deadly. You are Slippy.

In this simple world you try to slip through all of the obstacles to get to the end of this slippery situation.  Slide through many environments and unlock new characters!  Some say the game is hard, but you should really try for yourself.

Features:

- Challenging stage

- Simple graphics

Features to come:

- Character change

- Longer level

Controls:

- A and D to move

- R to reset the high score

- T to reset the checkpoint (you will respawn at the start)

Installation: (This game is for windows only for now there might be a android version later)

- Download slippy.zip

- Unzip it in a folder. (can use any zip program like winrar or 7zip)

- Open Slippy.exe (you can delete slippy.zip now)

Credits:

- Bumbo i got the idea from iskall85 https://www.youtube.com/user/AhlViktor

- Models, level created by me, but for the basics i used Brackey's tutorial https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPV2KyIb3jR53Jce9hP7G5xC4O9AgnOuL
